name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dubsy - instant video dubbing for Youtube.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly dub YouTube videos in any language and share them with the world!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Dubsy, your one-click solution to translating and dubbing videos into any language, on the fly!

Dubsy seamlessly integrates camb.ai’s cutting-edge AI technology (MARS and BOLI) to translate and dub any YouTube video into your chosen language in 4 clicks. 

How to use:
> Step 1: Sign in / Sign up using your camb.ai account (https://studio.camb.ai)
> Step 2: Open YouTube and find the Dubsy menu under the progress bar on the left side.
> Step 3: Click on “Dub For Another Language” button.
> Step 4: Select the original and your preferred language, click submit and wait for it to process.

And Ta da! Your video is now successfully dubbed in your selected language!

With Dubsy, you can now enjoy YouTube videos in any language of your choice. Whether you're learning a new language, exploring global content, or simply seeking clarity in your native tongue, Dubsy has you covered.

Features Overview:
---> Wide Language Selection: Choose from 100+ languages with voice preservation.
---> Language Switching: Switch between your translated languages and original language with just a click.
---> Easy to use: Dubsy transforms spoken audio into your preferred language with just a click of a button, without you needing to do anything.
---> Shareable: You can share your dubs with friends and vice-versa. Invite them on to unlock many more videos to watch!
---> Accurate Performance transfer: Create a near-perfect replica of the performance in the target languages (with voice preservation, style cloning etc)
---> CAMB.AI's Powerful and Evolving AI: Dubsy utilizes Camb AI's advanced AI technology, known for its accuracy and continuous improvement. This ensures you get the best possible dubbing experience, always getting better.

Dive deeper into camb.ai’s translating and dubbing technology: https://www.camb.ai
